reviewText:
this was my introduction to one of the coolest 80s cartoons EVER!

It's four music videos combined with the three past Raccoons specials--"The Raccoons' Christmas", "The Raccoons on Ice", and "The Raccoons and the Lost Star". That's all I have to say for now about it.

In the meantime, I'll be on the lookout for the other three specials (on LimeWire, which I occasionally use). But for the rest of you Raccoons fans, good luck finding them elsewhere!
